mapper.select: select m.id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.icon, m.perms, m.type, m.require_auth, m.parent_id from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id inner join sys_role r on rm.role_id = r.id inner join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id and ur.user_id = #{id} where m.type = 1

select m.perms from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id inner join sys_role r on rm.role_id = r.id inner join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id and ur.user_id = #{id} where m.type = 2
